reviews.review_msg: He was actually at VCC for Fall 2019 and he was the best English teacher I've had. I showed him each of my essays and Graeme made it even better, correcting grammer and strengthening ideas. Takes everyone's ideas/thoughts into consideration and will not pick on anyone. I wish he was teaching at VCC more often! We need more teachers like him.
Really knows his stuff and is always willing to meet with you if you need some extra guidance with the material. One of my favourite profs at SFU! I would hands down take another class with him.
A really nice guy who is super willing to help. He is passionate while being a little anxious and fidgety, but he's great. Would definitely take a class with him again.
One of the best professors I've ever had! He really knows what he's talking about and is very approachable!

Really awesome, really nice guy. A little quiet, but you can tell he really loves what he's teaching and is VERY smart. He's a little bit nervous but his teaching style is excellent and I would definitely take another class from him. Plus he's adorable.

Nadine thinks she's great because she has her doctorate. seriously. I was so stoked for this class and she killed it. She handed our assignments back weeks late. She pretty much thought everything you had to say was stupid. She majorly had favorites. One of the worst teachers I've had for sure and I'm in my last semester.
